article.description: Kendrick Harris scored 17 points and Devon Lamb had a double-double as Lamar held off Texas-Arlington 76-72 on Saturday night.
article.headline: LaMarcus Reed's 15 not enough to save Texas-Arlington
article.linkText: Reed's 15 not enough to save Texas-Arlington
article.story: ARLINGTON, Texas -- Kendrick Harris scored 17 points and Devon Lamb had a double-double as Lamar held off Texas-Arlington 76-72 on Saturday night. Anthony Miles had 16 points, six steals and five assists for the Cardinals (8-8, 2-1 Southland Conference). Brandon Davis added 16 points, and Lamb had 13 points and 12 rebounds. LaMarcus Reed led the Mavericks (7-9, 1-2) with 15 points. Bradley Gay and Armani Williams scored 14 apiece, Bo Ingram had 11 and Shaquille White-Miller 10. But the Mavericks shot only 35.2 percent (25 of 71). Miles' three-point play with 1:12 elapsed put the Cardinals ahead 3-2 and started a 13-0 run, after which the Mavericks never led. Lamar was up 33-18 at intermission, pushed it to 18 in the second half and still led 68-58 with 1:19 left. Texas-Arlington rallied within four but got no closer.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
